data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Chien-Hui, Lin, Chia-Wei, Chan, Tin-Yam (2014): Additional slipper lobsters of the subfamily Scyllarinae Latreille, 1825 (Crustacea, Achelata, Scyllaridae) from Taiwan. Zootaxa 3852 (3): 336-346, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3852.3.3
